scripts.clean:results: rm -rf allure-results allure-report cypress/videos cypress/screenshots combined-allure-results
scripts.test:both: npm run clean:results && npm run test:chrome && npm run test:electron:separate && npm run combine:reports
scripts.test:electron:separate: CYPRESS_allure=false cypress run --browser electron --config video=false --env allure=false
scripts.combine:reports: mkdir -p combined-allure-results && cp -r allure-results/* combined-allure-results/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.report: npm run test:both && allure generate combined-allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open
scripts.report:combined: allure generate combined-allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open
